MESSAGE: You are now at the control panel again. In order to save your crewmates and yourself from freezing to death, you must press these three buttons to fix the issue with the warmth keeping system
You are now at the control panel. In order to save your crewmates and yourself from CO2 poisoning, you must press these four buttons to fix the issue with the air filtration system

You are now at the control panel. In order to ensure that you and your crewmate will have water to drink for this whole trip, you must press these five buttons to fix the issue with the water purification system
You are now at the control panel. In order to save your crewmates and yourself from fainting because of low oxygen supply, you must press these three buttons.

There is 0 tolerance for you to make a mistake in space, because if you make one accidentally, it might cost your life.

Welcome back fellow astronauts.
In this mission, you will be experiencing different types of crisis that astronauts face during their voyage towards mars in the space shuttle
What you see now is a control panel, the control panel can control everything, but for different problems, the pattern of the buttons that you need to press will be different
Even though you see these three buttons at first, but in space, astronauts fly around from different directions, and they can't really tell the direction that they are facing when they are in space
Which is why your job is to help them press the corresponding patterns that the astronauts should press when they are facing in different directions
The red buttons are the ones that you were suppose to press. The button with a cross on it is the one that you pressed wrong
Let's try again
